elements.label: Intensive Glazing
elements.description: A feature of the building that involves a lot of glass.

elements.label: Heat Transfer
elements.description: The process of thermal energy movement from one place to another, influenced by the intensive glazing.

elements.label: Interior Double Facade
elements.description: A solution to mitigate the heat transfer issue caused by intensive glazing.

elements.label: Ventilation in Summer
elements.description: The effect of using an interior double facade, which helps in air circulation during summer.

elements.label: Comfort Temperature
elements.description: A desirable indoor temperature achieved during summer due to the ventilation provided by the interior double facade, and during winter due to the insulation provided by the interior double facade.

elements.label: Insulation in Winter
elements.description: The interior double facade acts as an insulator, retaining warmth during winter.

elements.label: Exterior Shadings
elements.description: Shadings on the exterior of the building.

elements.label: Angle of the Shadings
elements.description: The angle at which the exterior shadings are positioned.

elements.label: Summer Heat Gain Mitigation
elements.description: Analysis of how exterior shadings and their angle help in reducing heat gain during summer.

elements.label: Winter Heat Gain Enhancement
elements.description: Analysis of how exterior shadings and their angle, as well as the removal of the south floor slab, contribute to increased heat gain during winter.

elements.label: Optimizing Double Facade Performance
elements.description: The result of considering the angle of the shadings and the interior double facade together, aiming to optimize the building's thermal performance.

elements.label: Lateral Slabs
elements.description: Existing structural elements of the building.

elements.label: Sufficient Daylight
elements.description: The amount of natural light the lateral slabs receive.

elements.label: Lateral Functions
elements.description: Functions or spaces located on the lateral slabs.

elements.label: Blocking Daylight
elements.description: The issue of the lateral functions blocking natural light to the central part of the building.

elements.label: Remove the South Floor Slab
elements.description: A design decision to remove the south floor slab to improve central daylight.

elements.label: Improve Central Daylight
elements.description: The result of removing the south floor slab, leading to enhanced natural light in the central part of the building.

elements.label: Semi-Open Spaces
elements.description: Spaces created as a result of removing the south floor slab and the step design.

elements.label: Functions Interaction
elements.description: The interaction between different functions located in the lateral slabs.

elements.label: Step Design
elements.description: A design decision to create stepped spaces in the lateral slabs.

elements.label: Co-working
elements.description: A space or function that benefits from semi-open spaces and the step design.

elements.label: Facade Pop-Out Volumes
elements.description: Structures on the ground floor that extend out from the facade.

elements.label: Summer Heat Gain Increase
elements.description: Analysis of how the facade pop-out volumes can lead to an increase in heat gain during summer.

elements.label: Green Balconies
elements.description: Green roofs on the facade pop-out volumes, functioning as balconies for the first floor.

elements.label: Thermal Insulation
elements.description: The result of using green balconies, leading to reduced heat transfer.

elements.label: Air Change
elements.description: The requirement for air circulation within the building.

elements.label: Openable Windows
elements.description: A solution for providing air change, effective when used in conjunction with the interior double facade.

elements.label: HVAC System
elements.description: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning system chosen for the building.

elements.label: Duct Distribution
elements.description: A necessary component for the HVAC system, distributing air throughout the building.

elements.label: Save the Nervi Designed Ceiling
elements.description: A design goal to preserve the architectural integrity of the ceiling designed by Nervi on the ground floor.

elements.label: Using the Existing Beam Shape
elements.description: A design decision to utilize the shape of existing beams for duct distribution in the upper levels.

elements.label: Facade Pop-Out Volumes
elements.description: Structures on the ground floor that extend out from the facade.

elements.label: Summer Heat Gain Increase
elements.description: Analysis of how the facade pop-out volumes can lead to an increase in heat gain during summer.

elements.label: Green Balconies
elements.description: Green roofs on the facade pop-out volumes, functioning as balconies for the first floor.

elements.label: Thermal Insulation
elements.description: The result of using green balconies, leading to reduced heat transfer.

elements.label: Air Change
elements.description: The requirement for air circulation within the building.

elements.label: Openable Windows
elements.description: A solution for providing air change, effective when used in conjunction with the interior double facade.

elements.label: HVAC System
elements.description: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning system chosen for the building.

elements.label: Duct Distribution
elements.description: A necessary component for the HVAC system, distributing air throughout the building.

elements.label: Save the Nervi Designed Ceiling
elements.description: A design goal to preserve the architectural integrity of the ceiling designed by Nervi on the ground floor.

elements.label: Using the Existing Beam Shape
elements.description: A design decision to utilize the shape of existing beams for duct distribution in the upper levels.

elements.label: High Ceiling
elements.description: The building has a design feature of high ceilings.

elements.label: Stack Ventilation
elements.description: A method of natural ventilation that utilizes the high ceilings for air circulation during summer.

elements.label: Heat Loss in Winter
elements.description: The high ceilings contribute to heat loss during the winter months.

elements.label: Radiant Heating System
elements.description: A heating system chosen to compensate for the heat loss in winter, especially in semi-open spaces.

elements.label: Mechanical Rooms
elements.description: Rooms designated for housing the mechanical components of the HVAC system.

elements.label: New Vertical Access Boxes on the Facade
elements.description: Added structures on the exterior of the building to provide vertical access, helping to preserve the Nervi designed ceiling.

elements.label: Save Existing Staircases
elements.description: A decision to maintain the existing staircases in the building.

elements.label: Fire Escape
elements.description: Requirements for safe egress in the event of a fire.

elements.label: Fire Proofing Existing Staircases
elements.description: Requirements for safe egress in the event of a fire.

elements.label: Uniformly Designed Exteriors
elements.description: The exterior design of the building is uniform across all sections.

elements.label: Non Inviting Entrances
elements.description: The uniformity of the exterior design results in entrances that are not easily distinguishable or welcoming.

elements.label: Uniquely Distinct Exteriors
elements.description: A design goal to create exteriors that are easily distinguishable and inviting.

elements.label: Giardino Corpo Italiano di Liberazione
elements.description: A specific area or feature located on the north side of the building.

elements.label: Connection Underground Level and Park
elements.description: A study on how to better connect the underground levels of the building with the park.

elements.label: Outdoor Plaza
elements.description: A proposed space to enhance the connection between the underground level and the park, providing various benefits.

elements.label: Natural Light for Underground
elements.description: A positive outcome of the outdoor plaza, bringing natural light to the underground levels.

elements.label: Define Event Center Entrance
elements.description: The outdoor plaza helps to clearly mark the entrance to the event center.

elements.label: Existing Cinema
elements.description: A pre-existing cinema structure.

elements.label: Sufficient Ceiling Height
elements.description: The existing cinema has a ceiling height that is adequate for certain purposes.

elements.label: Event Center
elements.description: A newly designed space, repurposing the underground level of the existing cinema.

elements.label: Low-Impact Adaptive Reuse
elements.description: A strategy focusing on repurposing existing structures with minimal impact.

elements.label: Urban Memory Reconnection
elements.description: A strategy to reconnect the urban fabric and revive historical or cultural memory through design interventions.

elements.label: Economic Synergy
elements.description: A strategy aiming to create economic benefits through collaborative and multipurpose use of spaces.

elements.label: Multi-Purpose Collaborative Event Center
elements.description: The result of transforming the event center into a space that supports various functions.

elements.label: Dedicated University Entrance
elements.description: A specific entrance designated for university-related activities.

elements.label: North Main Entrance
elements.description: One of the primary entrances located on the north side of the building.

elements.label: South Main Entrance
elements.description: One of the primary entrances located on the south side of the building.

elements.label: Dedicated Co-Working Entrance
elements.description: A specific entrance designated for co-working spaces.

elements.label: City's Primary Highway Entrance
elements.description: An analysis of the site's connection and visibility from the city's main highway.

elements.label: Save Lateral Slabs
elements.description: A design decision to preserve the existing lateral slabs of the building.

elements.label: Career Center
elements.description: A space fostering interaction between university and innovation hub.

elements.label: Library
elements.description: A space for study and research, serving both the university and co-working communities.

elements.label: Canteen
elements.description: A dining area serving the university and co-working communities.

elements.label: My Desk
elements.description: A type of co-working space offering dedicated desks.

elements.label: My Flex
elements.description: A flexible co-working space.

elements.label: My Office
elements.description: Private office spaces within the co-working area.

elements.label: Social Integration
elements.description: A strategy to foster interaction and integration among different functions and communities.

elements.label: Service Access
elements.description: An analysis of how service access can be provided, particularly for the food court.

elements.label: Merging Polito and Unito
elements.description: A design decision to merge two universities, creating synergies and shared facilities.

elements.label: Shared Facilities
elements.description: Facilities that are shared between the merged universities.

elements.label: Laboratories
elements.description: Spaces equipped for scientific research and experimentation.

elements.label: Classrooms
elements.description: Spaces designated for teaching and learning activities.

elements.label: Lecture Hall
elements.description: A large room used for lectures and presentations.

elements.label: Corso Piero Maroncelli
elements.description: A location or area mentioned in the context.

elements.label: Local Urban Context
elements.description: An analysis of the local urban context related to Corso Piero Maroncelli.

elements.label: Corso Unita d’Italia
elements.description: Another location or area mentioned in the context.

elements.label: City's Primary Highway Entrance
elements.description: An analysis of the site's connection and visibility from the city's main highway.

elements.label: Food Court
elements.description: A designated area within the building for dining and food services.

elements.label: University
elements.description: A section of the building dedicated to university-related activities and functions.

elements.label: Innovation Hub
elements.description: A space designed to foster innovation and collaborative work.

elements.label: Universities Requirement Program
elements.description: An analysis of the requirements and needs of the universities involved in the project.

elements.label: Expanded Existing Slabs
elements.description: An expansion of the existing lateral slabs using a light structure.

elements.label: Light Structure
elements.description: A design choice for expanding the existing slabs, contributing to the strategy of low-impact adaptive reuse.

elements.label: Rotated-Angle
elements.description: A design element applied to the expanded slabs and facade pop-out volumes to align with the existing ceiling geometry.

elements.label: Combination with the Existing Ceiling Geometry
elements.description: The result of applying a rotated-angle to the design elements, aiming to achieve a low-impact adaptive reuse strategy.

elements.label: A Potential Incubator for Innovation, Backed by Local Government
elements.description: A concept shared by Lo Russo for the project.

elements.label: Exploring Hybrid Ideas for Palazzo del Lavoro's Sustainability
elements.description: A sustainability plan shared by Lo Russo for Palazzo del Lavoro.

elements.label: Polytechnic Rector's Plan to Expand Health Park at Palazzo del Lavoro
elements.description: An expansion plan shared by Lo Russo for the Health Park at Palazzo del Lavoro.

elements.label: A Versatile Hub for Diverse Service Activities
elements.description: A vision shared by the Municipal Councilor for the project.

elements.label: Shopville Concept Abandoned in Favor of Sustainable Commercial Service at CDP Project
elements.description: A shift in concept shared by the Municipal Councilor for the CDP project.

elements.label: A Collaborative Vision for a Community-Centric Multifunctional Hub
elements.description: A vision for a multifunctional hub shared by CDP.

elements.label: Scientific and Work Campus for Innovation and Education
elements.description: A plan for a scientific and work campus shared by CDP.

elements.label: A Multifunctional Innovation Hub through Private Engagement
elements.description: A vision for a multifunctional innovation hub shared by CDP.

elements.label: The science museum dedicated to Piero Angela
elements.description: A proposal for a science museum dedicated to Piero Angela, shared by Guido Saracco.

elements.label: Research laboratories and Piero Angela museum
elements.description: A vision for research laboratories and a museum dedicated to Piero Angela, shared by Guido Saracco.

elements.label: Guest spaces of the Parco della Salute
elements.description: A plan for guest spaces at Parco della Salute, shared by Guido Saracco.

elements.label: Lo Russo
elements.description: An actor involved in the project, providing insights and plans.

elements.label: Municipal Councilor
elements.description: Another actor involved in the project, sharing visions and concepts.

elements.label: CDP
elements.description: An actor representing a collaborative vision for the project.

elements.label: Guido Saracco
elements.description: An actor sharing ideas related to science, innovation, and education.
